summary: CPSC#I1220203A. 12 VOLT HEATER FAN AND DEFROSTER. CONSUMER STATED IT BLEW LITTLE TO NO HOT AIR AND HAD NO MOUNTING DEVICE WITH IT. *LN  THE CONSUMER ALSO STATED WHENEVER SHE MOVED THE WIRE, IT WOULD SHUT OFF. ON ONE OCCASION WHILE DRIVING, WITH THE UNIT IN USE, THE CONSUMER SMELLED A BURNING ODOR. SO, SHE UNPLUGGED THE HEATER IMMEDIATELY. THE PLUG WAS EXTREMELY HOT AND SOME OF THE PLASTIC HAD MELTED AND BECAME STUCK TO HER HAND. *JB
